title: Pavlov touched dog gave it vinegar then salivated

content.question: In a set of studies, a researcher first touched a dog lightly on the side of its body and a few seconds later placed vinegar on the dogâ€™s tongue. The vinegar made the dog salivate. After several pairings of touch and vinegar, the dog began to salivate as soon as it was touched and before it was given the vinegar. In these studies, which of the following was the conditioned stimulus?
